emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Curtis Parker, Rev. George A. Fitch, placing crown on Desiree Nelson, winner of Sweetheart Contest, Phyllis Gray, Gerald Farris, and Mark Washington, gathered in Homewood AME Zion during Sunday School
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1973, pg. 16 reads: "Valentine Coronation - Darling Little Desiree Nelson, who reported a total $316 in Sweetheart Contest sponsored recently by members of the Homewood AME Zion Sunday School, reigns supreme at the Coronation. 'King Curtis Parker,' standing left, reflects a smile of delight as the pastor, Rev. George A. Fitch, situates the queen's coronet.  A trio of other participants, reading from left are, Phyllis Gray, Gerald Farris and Mark Washington.  A total of $700 was raised.  Another contestant, Rhonda Snipes, is not in photo. - Harris Photo."
